wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Hoare (21 March 1814 – 21 January 1886) was a British Conservative Party politician and banker.

*Joseph Hoare (college principal) (1709–1802), Welsh clergyman and principal of Jesus College, Oxford
*Joseph Hoare (bishop of Ardagh and Clonmacnoise) (1842-1927), Roman Catholic bishop
